mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t5.id, t5.menu_name AS menuName, t5.menu_code AS menuCode, t5.menu_type AS menuType, t5.menu_parent_id AS menuParentId, t5.remark, t5.isvalid, t5.ctime, t5.creater, t5.mtime, t5.updater FROM sys_user t1 INNER JOIN sys_user_role t2 ON t2.isvalid = 1 AND t2.user_id = t1.id INNER JOIN sys_role t3 ON t3.isvalid = 1 AND t3.id = t2.role_id INNER JOIN sys_role_menu t4 ON t4.isvalid = 1 AND t4.role_id = t3.id INNER JOIN sys_menu t5 ON t5.isvalid = 1 AND t5.id = t4.menu_id WHERE t1.isvalid = 1 AND t1.id = #{userId}
